xwikidoc.author: XWiki.TodHarter
xwikidoc.title: Olethia
xwikidoc.content: The principal town of the Duchy of Blar. Old Street runs through it. In the 840's the town was the center of an evil cult instigated by the Pig Idol. It has since become rather zealously attached to Klay worship.
